thread.title: VIDEO: Hummels pulls off amazing last-ditch challenge
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Hummels pulls off amazing last-ditch challenge

title: VIDEO: Hummels pulls off amazing last-ditch challenge
text:
0 12-Mar-2017 14:51:32 The Germany international was on hand to deny Frankfurt early on in Saturday's clash, with his challenge sparking wild celebrations 
Bayern Munich may have moved 10 points clear at the top of the Bundesliga table with a win over Frankfurt, but it was not all plain sailing for Carlo Ancelotti's side. 
With the scores still goalless at the Allianz Arena, Mats Hummels was called into action to pull off one of the best last-ditch challenges of the season so far. Unreal... @matshummels produces one of the tackles of the season. #BTEFS #Bundesliga https://t.co/b8g7Z6sPQk â€” BT Sport Football (@btsportfootball) March 12, 2017 
The celebrations that followed almost suggested that Hummels had scored rather than saved a goal, such was the brilliance of the Germany international's challenge. 
Check out the challenge above - is it the best tackle of the season? Related
